name: inarticulately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way whose meaning is not clear or is difficult to understand: He uses words inarticulately. She was mumbling inarticulately. See
inarticulate
More examplesFewer examplesI was inarticulately trying to convey my sense of impending doom.He inarticulately tried to repeat what he’d been told to say. They tried - inarticulately and unsuccessfully - to explain the new policy.
